indications: Indications cleansing and deodorising suppurating eczematous reactions and wounds
name: POTASSIUM PERMANGANATE
breadcrumbs: 13.11 Skin cleansers, antiseptics, and desloughing agents
doses: Wet dressings or baths, approx. 0.01% solution

to be diluted 1 in 10 to provide a 0.01% (1 in 10 000)
solution
